properties.description: Sony is a very powerful company within Japan and controls a significant portion of the cellular device market throughout Asia and Europe and is expanding rapidly into the United States to take a chunk out of that massive market as well.  I currently own one of these phones and use it every day and have not become a part of I’phone nation or the downward spiraling blackberry.  Sony Ericsson is a big brand name that operates on the android system and has the potential to take over the whole system.
